title.en: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit

altTitles.en: Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon

description.en:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...
Cheerful, energetic Akari moves into an old, grand mansion... However, a cursed doll already lives there! Will they be able to get along under the same roof?

altTitles.en: Apotheosis – Elevation to the Status of a God
Principles of Heavens - Zen’s Cultivation of Immortality

description.en: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
description.fr:
Luo Zheng est un esclave qui était auparavant fils ainé d’une famille riche. En raison du déclin de sa famille et de l’enlèvement de sa sœur par une force puissante, il est désormais piétiné et humilié par les autres. Cependant, le paradis ne scelle jamais toutes les sorties. Un livre ancien laissé par son père révèle une technique divine secrète, donnant au lecteur un immense pouvoir ! Mais que cache ce pouvoir ? Une course contre le destin débute !  
  


---

Official English Alternative:  
<https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/119>
description.it: Luo Zheng, ora un umile schiavo, è nato come il figlio maggiore di una famiglia ricca. A causa del declino della sua famiglia, del rapimento di sua sorella da parte di una forza potente, ora può essere calpestato solo da altri. Tuttavia, il paradiso non chiude mai tutte le uscite. Un libro antico lasciato da suo padre rivela una tecnica divina segreta, dando al lettore un potere immenso! Ma cosa c'è dietro questo potere? Questa è una gara contro il destino.

altTitles.ja-ro: Sei Hantai na Danjo to Inu no Deai

altTitles.en: Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs

description.en:
A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,
 Scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend...
 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!

title.en: The Sweet Life of a Reincarnation Pro

altTitles.en: Sweet Honey of the Reincarnated Pro

altTitles.ja: 転生のプロが甘い蜜を吸う方法

altTitles.en: How a Former Pro Takes Advantage by Doing an Easy Job

description.en:
This is his 101st reincarnation!
Is this life a fantasy again? Another fantasy? Just as he is disappointed, he hears his mother's mumbling.
He is the youngest prince with no inheritance rights?
No one pays attention to him?
Hooray! This life is a piece of cake.
He is tired of saving the world or fighting desperately for ambition.
What does he want?

Only to enjoy the sweet honey!

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

There exists a limbo realm where the cost of admission is death! Here a new battlefield is populated by the most powerful and fearsome martial artists the world has ever known. Time holds little importance as fighters from many eras and periods of history share the same timeline. From the hit video game series SNK vs. Capcom comes an exciting martial arts event. Capcom's most popular fighting game characters face off against SNK's legendary masters. All your favorite characters are here: Vega, Mai Shiranui, Dimitri - the Vampire, Chun Li, Guile, Akuma, the mysterious Mr. Karate, and others have all gathered for reasons yet to be revealed. Witness explosive battles between Ryu and Kyo Kusanagi, Terry Bogard vs. M. Bison, Iori vs. Balrog and many more seemingly unlikely match-ups. Some fight for glory, some for survival, while others keep secret a more sinister purpose.

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en: The game has emerged into reality, the rules of the world have been turned upside down and humanity has entered the era of becoming players with the world set as a game stage. The only way to become a player is by leveling up to become stronger! The only way to rise to the top of the world! On the day of world fusion Lin Moyue chose to take on the sole hidden class, Necromancer. From then on, Lin Moyue would not die until his summoned creatures died out. “I sit on the throne of bones as the God of the dead and walk between life and death.” “I am a walking catastrophe!”
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

description.en:
Hae Jin has a father who devoted his whole life to finding the national artifacts that were smuggled out of the country.
Then one day, after receiving an unknown “artifact” sent by his father, whom he had lost contact with for a long time, a strange light suddenly came from it, granting Hae Jin a mysterious “power” and a “mission”…
“The magic of the Heavenly Object has been bestowed upon you.”
Thus, an adventure involving the artifacts scattered all over the world, including the ” Three Heavenly Objects”, which contains the soul of the Korean people, begins!

Yeon Hojeong, the first to unite the dark factions as the leader of the Unorthodox Faction, collaborates with the Orthodox Faction to overcome the chaos of the Three Cults. However, he meets an untimely end, entangled in the schemes of the Murim Alliance Leader.

"This really is my home!"

When he opens his eyes, he finds himself in the prestigious and once-destroyed Yeon Clan, a place he never forgot.

"I won’t make a mistake this time. Never again."

Determined to prevent the fall of his family and the future upheaval caused by the Three Cults, he embarks on a relentless journey! This is the struggle of Yeon Hojeong, the eldest son, to unite the martial world.

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.

title.en: Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga?

altTitles.ja: 昨日まで名前も呼んでくれなかった公爵様が、急に溺愛してくるのですが？@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinou made Namae mo Yonde Kurenakatta Koushaku-sama ga, Kyuu ni Dekiai shitekuru no desu ga?

altTitles.zh: 昨日为止都没有唤过我的名字的公爵大人突然开始宠爱我？

altTitles.zh-hk: 昨日為止都沒有喚過我的名字的公爵大人突然開始寵愛我？

description.en:
Mariène is troubled by the transformation of her cold-blooded and merciless husband, Duke Alexia.
After a solitary marriage confined to his mansion, he suddenly proposes to her once more and dotes on her as "my goddess"!
He presents her with bouquets of flowers covered in jewels every day, and seduces her with the heart-pounding techniques of romance novels.

A redemptive love fantasy between a cold-blooded prince who found love by reverting to death and an unfortunate, calm, goddess daughter!

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku ~Jichou wo Shiranai Kamigami no Shito~

altTitles.en: Adventure Record of Reincarnated Aristocrat ~ The apostle of Gods Who Doesn’t Know Self-Restraint~
Wonderful adventure in Another world! "God... That's going too far!!" he said...

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族の異世界冒険録 ～自重を知らない神々の使徒～

altTitles.en: Chronicles of an Aristocrat Reborn in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Bōken-roku ~ Jichō o Shiranai Kamigami no Shito ~

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่เป็นขุนนางไปผจญภัยในต่างโลก ~อัครฑูตจอมซุ่มซ่ามของทวยเทพ~

altTitles.zh: 转生贵族的异世界冒险录

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族的異世界冒險錄

altTitles.en: The Aristocrat’s Otherworldly Adventure: Serving Gods Who Go Too Far

description.en:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.id:
Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

description.ja:
敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.ko:
<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.th:
เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

description.zh:
超强觉醒者意外变身胖橘，
没想到铲屎官也有超能力!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

description.en:
Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
description.pt-br:
Izumo é um dos melhores alunos da escola e de aparência assustadora. Todo mundo tem medo dele, mas, na verdade, ele só quer amigos e uma vida escolar divertida. Um dia, ele é visado por uma súcubo chamada Anastasia, que tenta roubar sua alma virgem.

NOTA: Isto é um reboot da obra com arte aprimorada, mas com a história semelhante à da versão anterior.

description.en: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.

altTitles.en: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way up From Common People

altTitles.ja: モブから始まる探索英雄譚

description.en:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical Mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
description.pt-br: Takagi Kaito, um colegial de baixa estatura, o típico personagem Mob, era um explorador comum que caçava slimes todos os dias nas masmorras que surgiram no Japão, ganhando dinheiro extra enquanto admirava sua amiga de infância, a madona da classe. Um belo dia, um slime dourado que ele nunca tinha visto antes aparece para ele. Depois de derrotá-lo, ele obtém um item extremamente raro no valor de centenas de milhões, uma carta de Servo que pode convocar seres lendários!! Depois que ele se decide, ele a convoca, e uma donzela guerreira extremamente linda aparece. Supere sua posição como um simples Mob, Kaito! Uma nova fantasia moderna começa!

description.en: Heisuke is a high school student left in charge of taking care of his little cousin Aki for a day. Being an only child who usually stays at home alone, Aki is quiet, reserved, and will go out of his way not to make trouble for others. As they spend more time together, Aki begins to grow very attached to Heisuke, especially since Heisuke's hobby is to make sweets and desserts. The quiet Aki eventually opens up to Heisuke, and Heisuke in return teaches Aki that sometimes it's all right to be selfish, and say what you really want to do.

A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
description.id: Hanya musik yang menopangku dari rasa sakit yang menjengkelkan. Andai saja aku bisa mendengarkan musikku… dengan telingaku sendiri… Bahkan ketika jiwaku sedang hancur sekalipun, aku tetap akan berdoa kepada Tuhan… dan berdoa lagi. Ludwig van Beethoven dianggap sebagai komposer terhebat dalam sejarah manusia. Aku menutup mataku seperti itu. Dan 180 tahun kemudian di Seoul. Sang Saint musik, yang dikenal sebagai seorang jenius abadi, telah terlahir kembali. Dan kemudian tiba-tiba aku mulai mendengar suara malaikat. “Dobin.. Dobin..” …

title.en: Ore Dake 2-Shuume Gachizei - Tsuyo Sugite Game Balance wo Hakai Shita

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ2周目ガチ勢～強すぎてゲームバランスを破壊した～

altTitles.en: The Only New Game+ Hardcore Gamer ~I'm So Overpowered, I Shattered the Game's Balance~

description.en:
Rise to the top with knowledge and skills in your second life!

Former pro gamer Itsuki, who concealed his controversial past and worked as a VTuber, is attacked by problematic fans after getting doxxed, resulting in an accident that makes him lose consciousness. He wakes up only to find himself 10 years in the past, right after the launch of the hugely popular VRMMO Metasense!

There’s no need to hide his past in this world. Equipped with knowledge and skills from his first playthrough, becoming a top gamer and streamer is effortless!

I… will stand at the pinnacle of Metasense!

title.en: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter

description.en:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!

One day, The son of God came to the school. Her name is Go Deung Shin.
Since her arrival, Go Deung Shin has shown many miracles, such as raising a sitting person, knocking down the school’s bully, reviving the dead and other such miracles.

And Bae Du Hong, a loser at school was reborn by Go Deung Shin and fights as the first apostle to prove the miracles of Go Deung Shin.
But is she, or is he really the son of God? Or…

Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

title.en: Surviving in a School Bully Webtoon

description.en:
The author of the number one-ranked school bully webtoon, Noh Cheolmin, has been trapped in the world he created! And as the world’s weakest character!

His assistant, who ran away halfway into production, is in the body of the world’s strongest, the ‘Protagonist’?!

Can this chaotic duo, an author with a broken personality and his runaway assistant, survive in the harsh world of A School Bully Webtoon?

Forensic Scientist Kim Junghoon lies dead in the National Forensic Service’s autopsy room. He died full of regret after witnessing his work partner of 20 years, Kim Sangjin, distorted his very own autopsy report when he was still conscious and accused him of committing suicide. Right after he passed away, Kim Junghoon opened his eyes once more and found himself back in 2002 when he was still a rookie in the National Forensic Service. His final wish came true as he got himself one more chance to fix his past!

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr: Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.en: During the battle of Zhoulu, Chi You faced defeat. As the three prominent tribes united, humans consolidated their strength and established their homes. Consequently, the number of people seeking help from God dwindled which led to a gradual decline in heavenly power. Dissension ensued as the heavens sought to initiate another Zhuolu war…

altTitles.en: Become a Legend as an All-Rounder

description.en: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!
Hatsune Miku's one-panel manga series

altTitles.ja: 嫉妬を力に変える最強への道

description.en:
What should you do if transmigrated to a fantasy world and has become a son called the 'Human Race's Great Traitor'!

Don't worry, looking at his infinite epiphany system, all Bai Mo needs to do is to make others jealous of him!

No matter what kind of moves and cheats, as long as someone is jealous of him, Bai Mo can start an epiphany and let himself practice those to perfection in an instant!

So Bai Mo raised a lot of big villains around him, and occasionally molested them.

He liked to watch his enemies jealous and resentful of him, but they couldn't do that themselves!
description.id: Apa yang harus saya lakukan jika saya menjadi putra seorang yang dikenal sebagai pengkhianat umat manusia di dunia fantasi!  Jangan khawatir, melihat sistem pencerahannya yang tak terbatas, yang perlu dilakukan Bai Mo hanyalah membuat orang lain iri padanya!  Tidak peduli keterampilan atau buku rahasia apa pun, selama seseorang iri padanya, Bai Mo akan dapat membuka pencerahannya dan membiarkan dirinya mengembangkannya dengan sempurna dalam sekejap!  Oleh karena itu, Bai Mo telah mengangkat banyak penjahat besar di sekitarnya, dan sesekali menggodanya, dia suka melihat musuhnya iri dan membencinya, tetapi dia tidak bisa bertindak seperti dirinya sendiri!
description.zh: 越玄幻世界还变成了被称为人族大叛徒的儿子该怎么办！ 不急，看着自己的无限顿悟系统，白墨需要做的就是让别人嫉妒自己！无论何等功法、秘籍，只要有人嫉妒他，白墨就能开启顿悟，让自己瞬间将它修炼圆满！ 于是白墨身边养了很多大反派，偶尔调戏一下，就喜欢看着敌人嫉妒怨恨自己，却又干不了自己的样子！

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

In the realm of historical annals, Chen Xuanqiu, a descendant of a historian, enters the stage to avenge the grudge of Qingping Mountain. Entangling himself in an unresolved matrimonial fate, he steps into the chaos of troubled times. Through numerous strategic maneuvers, Chen Xuanqiu unveils the hypocritical facade of immortals. With unwavering determination, he vows to single-handedly rescue the suffering populace. A mere youth with a solitary sword, a new wind emerges, originating from the depths of Qingping.
description.zh: 史官之子陈玄丘为报青萍山之仇，以未了的姻缘入局，在适逢乱世之中入世。一场又一场的博弈，让陈玄丘看透了神仙的伪善嘴脸，誓以一己之力，拯救天下苍生。一介少年，一人一剑，风生于此，起于青萍。

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.

altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)
description.ko:
서비스 종료까지 앞으로 15년.
오직 나만이 엔딩을 알고 있다.

'나는 고인물이다'

---

description.ru:
До конца игры 15 лет. И только мне известно, как всё произойдет. – Я мертвая вода!

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)
description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

altTitles.en: For Your Sake, I’ll Never Leave Your Side

description.en: They haven't done anything yet - A story about a serious, simple, unadorned young man who wears nothing but the purest of clothes, never dreaming that he would fall in love . Until he meets a fragile girl working at a bento shop one day. This is a story about how a man and a woman who have never been in a romantic relationship before , start their newlywed life.
description.ja: 単行本1巻発売前から大反響＆大人気!!ほっこり＆むずキュン必至、直視できないほどの純情ラブ！二人はまだ何もシた事がない――真面目で朴訥、純情が服を着歩いているような青年は、“自分なんか”が恋に落ちるなど夢にも思っていなかった。あの日、弁当屋で働く儚げな少女に出会うまでは…。これは、清く澄みきった交際経験ナシの男女が、色々すっ飛ばして結婚生活＜いとなみ＞を始めるお話。

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

title.en: Kokoro no Koe ga Moreyasui Maid-san (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: 心の声が漏れやすいメイドさん

altTitles.en: The Maid whose Inner Thoughts Leak Out Easily

altTitles.zh-hk: 容易漏出心聲的女僕小姐到我家來了

description.en:
Being honest is good. Probably.

With Shuuji’s parents overseas on business, a maid has come to his house. She’s cute but she can’t keep a secret?! With her expressionless gaze, she thoughtlessly says the craziest things…! Living with this maid whose true thoughts are laid bare, a second year high school boy is thoroughly made fun of!

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.

title.en: Master of the Resurgence of Spiritual Energy

description.en: The resurgence of spiritual energy on Earth. Shen An receives a message from his future self and embarks on an invincible path! Shen An wants to keep a low profile, but the beautiful women around him won't allow it!

title.en: Ore ga Ojou-sama Gakkou ni "Shomin Sample" Toshite Rachirareta Ken

altTitles.en: I was Kidnapped as "Commoner Sample" for an All-Girls School
Shomin Sample: I Was Abducted by an Elite All-Girls School as a Sample Commoner

altTitles.th: นายสามัญชนจอมกวน ป่วนหัวใจยัยคุณหนูไฮโซ

altTitles.ja: 俺がお嬢様学校に「庶民サンプル」として拉致られた件

altTitles.zh: 关于我被绑架到大小姐学校当「庶民样本」这件事

altTitles.ko: 내가 아가씨 학교에 "서민 샘플"로 납치 된 사건

description.en: In a hidden school surrounded by mountains, young ladies of good families are taught everything a high class lady needs to know. They are also completely cut off from the outside world, keeping them sheltered and innocent. However, a problem has come up recently– more and more graduates are failing to cope with the modern world after graduation. To deal with this problem, they've decided to kidnap a male commoner student, and enroll him as a student. They hope that this will be a gentle way to introduce the girls to the outside world. Kagurazaka Kimito is chosen for this dubious honor, mostly because he seems utterly average. However, the school leaders also seem to have concluded he's a homosexual with a muscle fetish. When Kimito hears that the alternative may be castration (to protect the girls' purity), he eagerly plays along with this misconception. Now he'll just have to survive the attention of many high class young ladies that are completely out of touch with the world.
description.pt-br: Em uma escola escondida, cercada por montanhas, jovens senhoras de boas famílias aprendem tudo o que uma mulher de alta classe precisa saber. Elas também são completamente isoladas do mundo exterior, mantendo-se protegidas e inocentes. No entanto, um problema surgiu recentemente: Mais e mais garotas não estão conseguindo lidar com o mundo moderno após a graduação. Para sanar com esse problema, foi decido sequestrar um garoto "plebeu", e registrá-lo como um estudante dessa escola com o objetivo de este ser um caminho mais "suave" de introduzir as meninas ao mundo exterior. Kagurazaka Kimito é escolhido para esta duvidosa honra.
